review_blob: This beer tastes like dirt! Really, dirt. I looked at the bottle and it was bottled in Kenya--that means theyre probably using Kenyan water. With dirt in it. Really, Im surprised I didnt get cholera from drinking this. I immediately regretted my decision to order this, but I finished it, cursing Kenya Breweries all the way for putting this in a 16oz bottle. This is the worst beer I have ever had, on account of the dirt flavor. It might have been decent otherwise.
Tastes like cough syrup. Very, very sweet--too much so. Unassuming appearance with nearly no head. Clear bodied. Somewhat watery-syrupy texture, somewhat like soda, but thicker.
